name: Gift of Life (RawLionWorkshop)
description:
Submission for the Yogscast Game Jam.

A survival game where you have to share your resources and rely on others to help you out.

Balancing might need some work, but the basic concept works... kinda. Results can be highly random and unpredictable.

Controls:

Left Click - pick up and drop items, and shoot bow if equipped.
Right Click - eat food or herbs, light wood on fire, or equip a tool/weapon.
Hold Right Mouse Button to move, gather berries, catch fish or chop wood (with proper tool equipped)
Scroll Wheel - zoom in and out

Also includes:

Sharky and Palp Modifier - 

You carry some dead weight around with you constantly. It serves no purpose, but you must always get to the end with it. (Think companion cube from portal)

- Not quite dead yet! Indeed the goal of the game is to save the weight from becoming dead

Foleyship Modifier - 

Can you make a game where all of the sounds are made by your voice or items around you?

- All sounds in the game (except one :)) have been recorded through a laptop mic in my bedroom on the first day of the jam!
